title: Please Help me Out!!
body: I'm on mac and everytime I try updating the game it gets really close to being done then It stops.and says something is wrong and wont ever let me update it.Even if I uninstall and re install

replies.body: Help is here!  An unstable connection could be causing your update to backtrack and fail entirely.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection to the patching server, and any blocks along the way.  Let me know if you have any questions!
